thread.title: Megha Barsenge SPOILER Alert! Megha understands Arjun's kindness
thread.title_full: Megha Barsenge SPOILER Alert! Megha understands Arjun's kindness

author: @tellychakkar
title: Megha Barsenge SPOILER Alert! Megha understands Arjun's kindness
text: [TellychakkarTeam](/users/tellychakkarteam)on Fri, 08/30/2024 - 11:07 MUMBAI: Colors show ‘Megha Barsenge’ sheds light on a newlywed bride, abandoned by her NRI dulha Manoj who is challenged with weathering the deceit and restoring her family's reputation. Amidst her struggle, she finds an unexpected ally in Arjun, an IAS officer who aids her quest to confront the elusive groom. The show stars Neha Rana as Megha, Neil Bhatt as Arjun, and Kinshuk Mahajan as Manoj. It is produced by Parin Multimedia. It is a blend of meaningful storytelling and entertainment. (Also read: [“I always wanted to be part of a show like Megha Barsenge” says Neil Bhatt who essays the role of an IAS officer in COLORS’ new show](https://www.tellychakkar.com/tv/tv-news/i-always-wanted-be-part-of-show-megha-barsenge-says-neil-bhatt-who-essays-the-role-of)) As Arjun thanks Megha, we've recently seen that she tells him to give it his all. She worries about him going to the dance competition as well. Megha feels optimistic about it, though. Ranjeeta feels happy for Megha and uses her words to try to cheer her up. Megha feels disappointed in her father for breaking up with him. When Megha informs Ranjeeta that she knows she is there for her and that she wants to make sure she learns the truth, the story takes an intriguing turn. She watches Arjun perform, which makes her feel happy, but then Rajveer shoots her, which makes Arjun afraid. In the next episodes, we will witness Megha come to understand Arjun's kindness. She then feels guilty for hurting him and chooses to apologize to him for her actions. (Also read: [“I always wanted to be part of a show like Megha Barsenge” says Neil Bhatt who essays the role of an IAS officer in COLORS’ new show](https://www.tellychakkar.com/tv/tv-news/i-always-wanted-be-part-of-show-megha-barsenge-says-neil-bhatt-who-essays-the-role-of) For more news and updates from the world of television, OTT, and movies, stay tuned to TellyChakkar. Credits- latestgossipwu DISCLAIMER - WE ARE NOT TARGETING ANY ACTOR, WE ARE ONLY FOLLOWING THE TRACK OF THE SHOW AND ITS CHARACTERS.
